notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast.
Applies a hex on the target, silencing, muting and disarming it.
Pig, Out! transforms the user into a pig. However, the model is affected by the user's cosmetic items that change Hex models.

abilities.description: Turns your hero into a critter for 4 seconds and gives them +10% Movement Speed.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
6 main attack damage to all / / heroes.
name: Pig Pole
description: A makeshift charm misplaced by a peace-loving, addlebrained enchanter.
trivia: This item's internal name is "Unstable Wand".
